Html:
Hi,

I've added Metro Charts to my VS2012 C# project.
After creating a reference to the De.TorstenMandelkow.MetroChart DLL, coping the xaml code from the demoproject to my window, I've copied the c# code from the demoproject to my window.
I've also copied the MainSkin.xaml and Generic.xaml from the demoproject to my project.

I can compile and run my application but when i open the chartwindow, the window only shows the chart title and subtitle . The graph itself isn't displayed.

Does anyone know what I can do to solve this problem?
